languages.text: "И явил он знамение, осветив наши кроткие лики изумрудным люменом!"

traits.locale_text: "И явил он знамение, осветив наши кроткие лики изумрудным люменом!"

languages.text: "And so He gave us a sign, and bathed our humble visages in the light of the emerald lumen!"
languages.original_text: "И явил он знамение, осветив наши кроткие лики изумрудным люменом!"

traits.locale_text: "And so He gave us a sign, and humbled us with the emerald of Lumen!"
"And so He gave us a sign, and humbled us with the emerald of Lumen!"
"And so He gave us a sign, and bathed our humble visages in the light of the emerald lumen!"
"And so He gave us a sign, and bathed our humble visages in the light of the emerald lumen!"
"And so He gave us a sign, and bathed our humble visages in the light of the emerald lumen!"

languages.text: 「そして、主は我々に道標を与え、この謙虚な姿をエメラルドの光で照らしてくださったのだ！」
languages.original_text: "And so He gave us a sign, and bathed our humble visages in the light of the emerald lumen!"

traits.locale_text: 「そして、主は我々に道標を与え、この謙虚な姿をエメラルドの光で照らしてくださったのだ！」

languages.text: « Il nous a donné un signe et Il a baigné nos humbles visages dans la clarté du lumen d'émeraude ! »
languages.original_text: "And so He gave us a sign, and bathed our humble visages in the light of the emerald lumen!"

traits.locale_text: « Il nous a donné un signe et Il a baigné nos humbles visages dans la clarté du lumen d'émeraude ! »

languages.text: “祂赐予我们启示，让我们卑微的面容沐浴在流明灯的光辉之中！”
languages.original_text: "And so He gave us a sign, and bathed our humble visages in the light of the emerald lumen!"

traits.locale_text: “祂赐予我们启示，让我们卑微的面容沐浴在流明灯的光辉之中！”

languages.text: "Und so gab Er uns ein Zeichen und badete unsere demütigen Gesichter im Licht des Smaragdlumen!"
languages.original_text: "And so He gave us a sign, and bathed our humble visages in the light of the emerald lumen!"

traits.locale_text: "Und so gab Er uns ein Zeichen und badete unsere demütigen Gesichter im Licht des Smaragdlumen!"

languages.text: «¡Y entonces Él nos mandó una señal y bañó nuestros humildes semblantes en la luz del alumbre esmeralda!».
languages.original_text: "And so He gave us a sign, and bathed our humble visages in the light of the emerald lumen!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Y entonces Él nos mandó una señal y bañó nuestros humildes semblantes en la luz del alumbre esmeralda!».

languages.text: "O bize işaret verdi, mütevazı çehremizi zümrüt lümenin ışığında yıkadı!"
languages.original_text: "And so He gave us a sign, and bathed our humble visages in the light of the emerald lumen!"
